description: Comprehensive Disaster Management Programme (CDMP) - Phase I

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: Disaster Management Programming efforts are shifted from a response and relief emphasis to comprehensive risk management practices.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
